title: Public Address Loudspeaker

adjectives: Characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
verbs: To increase the amplitude of something, especially of an electric current.
nouns: An electromechanical device which produces sound
Device which transforms electrical signals into acoustical signals.
Transducer that converts electrical energy into sound energy
A loudspeaker is an electroacoustic transducer; a device which converts an electrical audio signal into a corresponding sound.
Electro-acoustic transducer that converts electrical signals into sounds loud enough to be heard at a distance
An electromechanical transducer that converts an electrical signal into audible sound.
Loudspeaker.
A portable, usually hand-held, funnel-shaped device whose application is to send a person's natural voice toward a targeted direction for a specified purpose.
Portable device used to amplify a person's voice.

A megaphone, speaking-trumpet, bullhorn, blowhorn, or loud hailer is a portable, usually hand-held, cone-shaped acoustic horn used to amplify a person's voice or other sounds and direct it in a given direction.
A portable, usually hand-held, funnel-shaped device that is used to amplify a person's natural voice toward a targeted direction.
A cone-shaped acoustic device held to the mouth to intensify and direct the human voice
(Chiefly U.S.) A megaphone which electronically amplifies a person's natural voice.

Public address system
PA AMPLIFICATION
A system used to amplify speech or music so that they may be heard by large crowds of people, especially outdoors

A public address system is an electronic sound amplification and distribution system with a microphone, amplifier and loudspeakers, used to allow a person to address a large public, for example for announcements of movements at large and noisy air and rail terminals.
Electronic voice-amplification apparatus used for singing, giving a speech, or broadcasting in public areas.
An electronic amplification system used as a communication system in public areas

description: A loudspeaker used to make announcements in public areas such as schools, or sporting grounds.
